Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional piece is not just an item; it's a statement of excellence that can significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we believe its value exceeds $15000. For a limited time, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $18000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. If you're interested in learning more about the product or discussing the details further, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
